title: [Candle Shop]
description: Filled with many burning candles, a pair of large bay windows flank the doorway.  The white walls are stained a sooty yellow-grey near the ceiling, and the floor is composed of green slate and blue riverstone blocks.  A red brocade curtain leads west, standing perpendicular to the glaes-topped counter at the rear of the room.
